dcterms:description: A dataset provided for the Weather4cast competition, which includes high-resolution multi-channel satellite observations to predict rainfall events for the next eight hours.
dcterms:title: Weather4cast Challenge

dcterms:description: Operational data provided for rainfall events, used in conjunction with satellite images for weather prediction.
dcterms:title: Operational Program for Exchange of Weather Radar Information (OPERA)

dcterms:description: Satellite images provided by EUMETSAT, used for weather forecasting and rainfall prediction.
dcterms:title: Satellite images from European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites (EUMETSAT)
